name: Carnage Ludum Dare
description:
Carnage was made for Ludum Dare 41. Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres.

I combined Driving with tower/castle defence. Try to escape the mafia and hire an escort to increase your chances of getting away.

Made using Game Maker Studio 1.4.1804 (Incase you want the source code)

p.s sorry if the code is confusing was in a bit of a rush
